thread.title: Jays infielder Pennington pitches in ALCS blowout loss to KC
thread.title_full: Jays infielder Pennington pitches in ALCS blowout loss to KC

title: Jays infielder Pennington pitches in ALCS blowout loss to KC
text:
> Top News Jays infielder Pennington pitches in ALCS blowout loss to KC Toronto Blue Jays' infielder Cliff Pennington pitches to the Kansas City Royals during the ninth inning in Game 4 of baseball's American League Championship Series on Tuesday, Oct. 20, 2015, in Toronto. (Nathan Denette/The Canadian Press via AP) MANDATORY CREDIT The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
